siteMetadata.title: Anton's blog, Azure cloud and all things infrastructure related
siteMetadata.subtitle: My insights, analysis and tips to share with dev community

frontmatter.title: Optimal VM for building code?
frontmatter.description: Every company runs into this challenge sooner or later - improve efficiency, lower build times, deploy faster. Azure offers VMs with varying CPU families. This article attempts to answer which one provides the best value for money.
